description: This file is a React component named `Recommendations`, responsible for fetching, displaying, and interacting with recommended activities within a web application. It manages state, effects, and user interactions including suggestions, feedback, saving recommendations, and UI controls, indicating it is part of a front-end React project.

methods.name: Recommendations()
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the recommendations page with data fetching, filtering, and user interaction functionalities.

methods.name: sparkConfettiLight()
methods.description: Helper function to display lightweight confetti animation respecting reduced motion preference.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Handles saving a recommendation, including API call and updating global state, with UI feedback.

methods.name: handleFeedback
methods.description: Processes user feedback (like/dislike) on recommendations, triggers confetti, and updates UI and state.

methods.name: tryAnother
methods.description: Refreshes the recommendations by incrementing refreshKey, triggering data refetch.

methods.name: SegmentControl
methods.description: Inner component rendering tab controls for filtering recommendations by all or department-specific.
